1.8.Global Privileges Travel Club
Global Privileges Travel Club is a customer loyalty program created to provide easy access to our best
available rates and privileges. The membership website is globalprivileges.com
Global Privileges members do NOT have a membership number so there is no need to ask for one.

gram created to provide easy access to our best
available rates and privileges. The membership website is globalprivileges.com
Global Privileges members do NOT have a membership number so there is no need to ask for one. If
someone calls the Dedicated Phone Line – 1-833-693-3033 we should assist them as best we can if they
mention they are a Global Privileges Travel Club member.
Global Privileges Travel Club
